welcome_message_body: Welcome to Minneapolis, a vibrant city known for its beautiful lakes, rich cultural scene, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Zen Box Izakaya
restaurants.description: Zen Box Izakaya is a japanese restaurant located in Minneapolis.
restaurants.address: 602 Washington Ave S (Corner of Washington & Portland), Minneapolis, MN 55415

restaurants.name: United Noodles and UniDeli
restaurants.description: United Noodles and UniDeli is a asian restaurant located in Minneapolis.
restaurants.address: 2015 E 24th St (btw Snelling Ave and Minnehaha Ave), Minneapolis, MN 55404

restaurants.name: Taco Taxi
restaurants.description: Taco Taxi is a taco restaurant located in Minneapolis.
restaurants.address: 1511 E Lake St (Bloomington Ave S), Minneapolis, MN 55407

restaurants.name: Owamni by The Sioux Chef
restaurants.description: Owamni by The Sioux Chef is a restaurant located in Minneapolis.

restaurants.name: Dilla's Ethiopian Restaurant
restaurants.description: Dilla's Ethiopian Restaurant is a ethiopian restaurant located in Minneapolis.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Flying Cloud Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and main terminal of Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Crystal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
